title: London Walking Tour - Treadmill Scenery DVD
description: A one hour walking tour of London including the Hyde Park, Covent Garden, Leicester Square, Trafalgar Square, Piccadilly Circus, Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey, Parliament Bridge, Big Ben, the London Eye, Globe Theatre, the Millennium Bridge, St. Paul's Cathedral, and the Tower of London. Includes a Dolby Stereo soundtrack recorded in London - you'll hear the actual sounds just as if you were walking in London. This Virtual Walk DVD actually makes the time spent exercising on a treadmill or elliptical "fly by." You'll exercise longer and enjoy every minute! If you want to lose weight, get fit, and stay healthy, this DVD is for you. Filmed at an average speed of 3 miles per hour, this Treadmill Scenery DVD is the closest thing to actually walking in London on a beautiful fall day. You'll see most of the famous monuments and sites of London. Whether you use this DVD with a treadmill, elliptical, Nordic Track, or even an indoor exercise bike, you'll exercise longer than ever before. And this DVD is so full of details that you'll notice something new every time you view it.
